thread.title: CNN Analyst: ‘We Have a Narcissistic President That Can’t Take a Punch’
thread.title_full: CNN Analyst: ‘We Have a Narcissistic President That Can’t Take a Punch’

author: Josh Feldman
title: CNN Analyst: ‘We Have a Narcissistic President That Can’t Take a Punch’
text:
CNN Analyst: ‘We Have a Narcissistic President That Can’t Take a Punch’ by Josh Feldman | 6:33   
CNN counterterrorism analyst Philip Mudd had some pretty harsh words for President Trump in response to his feud with the press. 
“This is a guy who looks in the mirror and he wants to see Adonis and we see Shrek,” Mudd said. “I mean, it’s not that complicated.” 
And he also made this observation: 
“The man can’t take a punch and as soon as the punch gets turned on him, he turns on the people who make him look like Shrek… We have a narcissistic president that can’t take a punch.” 
Watch above, via CNN.
